LVCONNECT_PRO_USER_NAME.description: OPTIONAL. Account email for the Pro LibreView service.

LVCONNECT_PRO_PASSWORD.description: OPTIONAL. Password for the Pro LibreView service.

LVCONNECT_PATIENT_ID.description: OPTIONAL. LibreView Pro connected patient UUID. Used with Pro accounts to access one of the connected patients data. Ignored for personal LibreView accounts.

LVCONNECT_TRUSTED_DEVICE_TOKEN.description: Personal account's trusted device token for 2FA verification

LVCONNECT_INTERVAL.description: The time (in milliseconds) to wait between each update. Default is 3600000 = 1 hour

LVCONNECT_MAX_FAILURES.description: OPTIONAL: The maximum number of attempts to connect to the LibreView server. Default: 3

LVCONNECT_FIRST_FULL_DAYS.description: OPTIONAL: The number of days to search for data on the first update only. Default: 90 days

LVCONNECT_PRO_TRUSTED_DEVICE_TOKEN.description: Pro account's trusted device token for 2FA verification

LVCONNECT_TIME_OFFSET_MINUTES.descripton: Time difference in MINUTES between UTC and your location. LibreView treats your local time as UTC and doesn't report the actual time differences, so data will be shown with wrong timestamps if this parameter is not set.
